sources.title: Fugitive Road (1934) ERICH VON STROHEIM
sources.description:
Stars: Erich von Stroheim, Wera Engels, Leslie Fenton
Directors: Frank R. Strayer, Erich von Stroheim (uncredited)

A romantic triangle between an amorous Austrian Captain, a fugitive American gangster, and a beautiful Russian refugee, set during WW I at an Austrian-Italian border outpost.

sources.title: Fugitive Road (1934; smallest download)
sources.description: Actors: Erich von Stroheim; Wera Engels; Leslie Fenton; Hank Mann Runtime: 1:05:13 This is in the public domain because the copyright wasn't renewed after 28 years. The Matroska (.mkv) file is the uploaded file; download it if your player can handle h.265 (HEVC).

metadata.Plot: An Austrian officer must face up to the good and evil aspects of his own personality as he becomes involved in a war.
metadata.Director: Frank R. Strayer, Erich von Stroheim
metadata.Writer: Charles Belden, Robert Ellis, Erich von Stroheim
metadata.Actors: Erich von Stroheim, Wera Engels, Leslie Fenton
